title: Recall Notification Report
summary: WASHINGTON, March 19, 2012 - Lawson Foods LLC, an Irvington, N.J., establishment, is recalling approximately 84,587 pounds of pork product, as it includes pork product imported from Canada that was not properly presented for re-inspection upon entry into the United States, the U.S. Department of...
impacted_products: Various weight cases of "PORK SHOULDER BUTTS," with an identifying case code of "30312."
